Formal complaint laid against NZ Law Society president Frazer Barton after church group advised it could destroy records of all children in its care https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/formal-complaint-laid-against-nz-law-society-president-frazer-barton-after-church-group-advised-it-could-destroy-records-所有受其照顾的儿童/TODUE44OQFEPRLOMIZOIFPXE44/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/formal-complaint-laid-against-nz-law-society-president-frazer-barton-after-church-group-advised-it-could-destroy-records-所有受其照顾的儿童/TODUE44OQFEPRLOMIZOIFPXE44/ Michael MorrahA staff member at Presbyterian Support Otago decided the records were “too much of a risk" Thu, 25 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 NZ Law Society president Frazer Barton is the subject of a formal complaint after a church group was advised it could destroy records of children in its care.
